channel.title: Research highlight on Benjamin Gravesteijn
channel.description: Recent content in Research highlight on Benjamin Gravesteijn

item.title: Research highlight: Cost effectiveness of ECPR
item.description: The first official post in the series of research highlight will be a paper that I recently published in the journal “Resuscitation”. The title of the study is “Cost-effectiveness of extracorporeal cardiopulmonary resuscitation after in-hospital cardiac arrest: A Markov decision model”, which is a lengthy, sophisticated, complex, and incomprehensible title, as research should be. Let’s break down what it is about, why we did this study, so we could have a chat about it some time.
